parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crash sensor bracket can cause the crash sensor light to illuminate, rendering the adaptive cruise control and other safety features inoperable, which can lead to accidents or reduced vehicle safety.
symptoms: Crash sensor light illuminates
adaptive cruise control is inoperable
crash sensor light flashes on and off
pre-collision assist not available
adaptive cruise not available sensor blocked.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents or reduced vehicle safety.
symptoms: Main screen freezes
unable to use cameras or GPS
rear screens remain on continuously
screen glitches
front camera does not work.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the cruise control system can cause accidents or reduced vehicle safety.
symptoms: Cruise control is inoperable
unable to set speed
cruise control manual bracket damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the horn can cause reduced vehicle safety in emergency situations.
symptoms: Horn is hard to hear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden loud volume during incoming calls can startle drivers, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Volume suddenly increases to a high level when receiving a call while using Apple CarPlay or Ford CarPlay
scaring the driver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunctioning front and rear cameras can affect parking and safety features, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Front camera malfunctioning after software update
rear camera malfunctioning after recall update
camera not functioning properly during parking
camera intermittently stops working.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can cause loss of control, accidents, and fires, putting drivers and passengers at risk.
symptoms: Flames from under the vehicle when applying brakes
brake fluid leak
vehicle engulfed in flames.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate horn volume can fail to alert other drivers, pedestrians, or cyclists, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Horn not loud enough to be heard
especially at highway speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Airbag and Forward Collision Avoidance Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of airbags and forward collision avoidance features can increase the risk of injury or accidents.
symptoms: Airbags did not deploy in a rear-end collision
forward collision avoidance feature failed to operate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to stall or lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle's RPMs rev hard
the vehicle surges forward
the vehicle stalls or dies
the "Service Car Soon" warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the turbo-eco boost and engine can cause the vehicle to jerk, lose power, and experience abnormal burning odors, which can lead to accidents or fires.
symptoms: The vehicle jerks
the vehicle goes into low-power mode
the vehicle surges forward
the steering wheel is hot to the touch
an abnormal burning odor is detected
the check engine warning light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended shifting of the vehicle can cause accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle independently shifts out of neutral into reverse without warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear differential can cause the vehicle to lose power, making it difficult to accelerate or turn, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The "AWD temporarily disabled" warning notification appears on the dash
the vehicle drives differently
it is slow to accelerate
and more difficult to turn.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle's systems to malfunction, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The ABS is "temporarily disabled"
the large display screen is black and not working
the USB and USB-C ports are not working.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A distorted or blank rear-view camera image can reduce the driver's visibility, increasing the risk of a crash when reversing.
symptoms: The rear-view camera displays a distorted image
the rear-view camera displays a blank image
the rear-view camera is intermittently functional.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front camera can reduce the driver's visibility, increasing the risk of a crash when operating at slow speeds.
symptoms: The front camera does not operate
the front camera does not turn on when the button is pushed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of parts for recall repairs can lead to delays, leaving vehicles in a potentially unsafe condition for an extended period.
symptoms: The dealer is unable to perform the recall repair due to part unavailability
the manufacturer has exceeded a reasonable amount of time for the recall repair.
